oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Possibly John D. Rockefeller holding Clement Bowers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Possible image of John D. Rockefeller, the partner of Lamont Bowers who is the father of Clement Bowers, the infant seated on the man's lap. Bowers was the financial advisor to Rockefeller and helped run his operation in both New York and Colorado.

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bowers, Lamont; Rockfeller, John D.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Franck Taylor Bowers took this picture of the dining room at the Bowers' summer residence, Glen Knob, which was located in the Town of Dickinson, about 4 miles from the family "mansion" in Binghamton.
